about.title: About Top Gun Barber Shop
about.subtitle: Where precision meets tradition, and every cut tells a story.

story.heading: Our Story
story.content: Top Gun Barber Shop was born from a simple belief: every man deserves a great cut. We're not just barbers—we're craftsmen who take pride in our work. From classic cuts to modern fades, we bring precision, excellence, and a touch of tradition to every chair. Located at Ruko Madison Grande K03, we've been serving Semarang with quality cuts and good vibes since day one.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Every cut is executed with meticulous attention to detail. We measure, we refine, we perfect—because your look matters.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We don't settle for good enough. Every service, every interaction, every moment is crafted to exceed expectations.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.description: Rooted in classic barbering techniques, we honor the craft while embracing modern styles and trends.
